channel.title: Player problem and wild
channel.description:
alright when my characters attack each other or attak a monster in melee, it looks like there ranging them.. how do i fix this?
and also i put the code in for showing the skull in the corner and saying wild when u enter the wild, i got no errors and it didnt work?
